title: Wards dying causes teemo's mushrooms to explode [Gameplay]
body: Friendly wards upon death trigger teemo's mushrooms to explode if placed on each other.  I have not seen enemy wards due to not knowing where they are but all friendly trinket wards so far upon death do this.

replies.body:
Hiya! 

Thanks for the report! We're aware of this issue and are already in the process of a fix! ^-^

> Thanks for the report! We're aware of this issue and are already in the process of a fix! ^-^

To clarify, when you say We're aware of this issue, I've noticed a lot of similar bugs relating to the new wards, primarily the blue trinket.
It seems that, sometimes, they act more like a unit like a minion and will consume skillshots and block movement.
Are you looking into wards entirely or just this particular incident with Teemo?
It's a larger issue that we're looking into and this is one of the smaller ones associated with it.
